contentList.content: Release an arc of lighting at a creature, causing the arc to jump to another creature within [1] of the first target. The lightning can jump up to [2] times, but cannot hit the same target twice.
If at least 3 arcs hit a single target, it must succeed at a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>.
Manipulate gravity around a Large or smaller object and fling it, possibly causing it's target target to be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> upon being hit.
Flinged item is ignited upon landing for [1].
